snippet.title: Solo to Social: Row together online with EXR | Indoor rowing app
snippet.description:
No more boring solo workouts: train on your indoor rowing machine together with friends online! 

Start for free on https://exrgame.com/

Follow EXR on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exrgame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/exrgame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@exrgame

Join the Facebook EXR Community:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/205157440630351
Join the EXR Discord:
https://discord.gg/QuNPgtCNuc
Join the EXR Strava Club:
https://www.strava.com/clubs/739056

-

Start your free trial and download the app to your iOS, Android, MacOS, Windows or Apple TV device. Connecting your rower is as simple as can be: EXR is compatible with all FTMS rowers and supports Concept2, WaterRower, RP3, Xebex, Technogym, First Degree Fitness and more. Join the world's greatest 3D rowing community now!

#exr #rowingworkout #rowingmachine
